name: The Battle of Zapote Bridge
description:
Day- days that lapsed

Conscripts- number of current soldiers

Food- available food for the army

Buttons:

Intel - get information from the enemy thru espionage

Advice- ask your adviser for any important hints 

Food- gather food for the army

Train- train the army for combat

Recruit- recruit more conscripts

Attack- engage the enemy, do not attack if unprepared!
